dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2865 IH: Technical Clarification to Public Law 113–243 Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Sessions (for himself and Mr. McDermott) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012 to make a technical correction relating to the amendments made by Public Law 113–243.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Technical Clarification to Public Law 113–243 Act of 2015.

section.header: Technical amendment relating to rollover of certain airline payment amounts

subsection.text: Section 1106(a) of the FAA Modernization and Reform Act of 2012 (26 U.S.C. 408 note) is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.header: Special rule for certain airline payment amounts
paragraph.text: In the case of any amount which became an airline payment amount by reason of the amendments made by section 1(b) of Public Law 113–243 (26 U.S.C. 408 note), paragraph (1) shall be applied by substituting (or, if later, within the period beginning on December 18, 2014, and ending on the date which is 180 days after the date of enactment of the Technical Clarification to Public Law 113–243 Act of 2015) for (or, if later, within 180 days of the date of the enactment of this Act).

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall take effect as if included in Public Law 113–243 (26 U.S.C. 408 note).
